welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Fort Lauderdale, known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and stunning waterways. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

restaurants.name: Hot Dog Heaven
restaurants.description: Hot Dog Heaven is a hot dog joint located in Lauderhill.

restaurants.name: ethos Greek Bistro
restaurants.description: ethos Greek Bistro is a greek restaurant located in Wilton Manors.

restaurants.name: Shuck N Dive
restaurants.description: Shuck N Dive is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Fort Lauderdale.
restaurants.address: 650 N Federal Hwy (US 1 and 6th St), Fort Lauderdale, FL 33304

restaurants.name: The Foxy Brown
restaurants.description: The Foxy Brown is a gastropub located in Fort Lauderdale.
restaurants.address: 476 N Federal Hwy, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301

restaurants.name: Top Hat Deli
restaurants.description: Top Hat Deli is a deli located in Fort Lauderdale.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and WestJet.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue, Allegiant Air, and Norwegian Air Shuttle.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Spirit Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights operated by international carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pompano Beach Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal is primarily used for private and corporate flights, with its own dedicated parking and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals and waiting areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Public Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Public Airport handles all international flights and offers customs and immigration services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Public Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dade Collier Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Dade Collier Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Miami International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The Central Terminal at Miami International Airport serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Miami International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
